resources.string: Once upon a time, Man started as a BABY and that is between the age of 1 to 3.
From a baby, man grew into a CHILD and that is between the age of 4 to 12.
From a child, man grew into a YOUTH and that is between the age of 12 to 30.
From a youth, man grew into an ADULT and that is between the age of 30 to 70.
From an adult, man AGED and that is between the age of 70 and above. The End!
